title: E-Commerce Platform
shortDescription: A modern e-commerce solution built with React and Node.js
longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform with features like cart management, payment processing, and order tracking. Built with scalability and performance in mind.

title: Portfolio Generator
shortDescription: Generate stunning portfolios with a few clicks
longDescription: A tool that helps developers create professional portfolios quickly and easily. Features include customizable templates and real-time preview.
